attributes.action: ME/CFS & Fibromyalgia included in Vaccine Group for Underlying health conditions
attributes.additional_details: Issue updated guidelines to GP's and Vaccinations clinics to ensure sufferers can get the jab when this group is called.
attributes.background:
ME/CFS and is a very debilitating condition and one that could be greatly exacerbated by COVID-19.  

The World Health Organisation class these conditions as a chronic neurological disease so we shoud be included in the underlying health conditions group.

rejection.details:
The decision about who is included in the clinically extremely vulnerable (shielded patients) list is a medical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about the list and how it is maintained here: https://digital.nhs.uk/coronavirus/shielded-patient-list
